info.title: Access Control
info.description: A set of endpoint to manage access control, roles, and permissions in the inTandem platform

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Max: 100

post.description:
Create a new role for a business

Available for **Business Tokens**

items.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the Permission

is_editable.description: A flag to indicate if the role can be edited by the business. By default, system roles are not editable. Can not be changed after creation

get.description:
Retrieve a specific BusinessRole  based on itâ€™s unique identifier (UID)

Available for **Business Tokens**

put.description:
Create a new role for a business

Available for **Business Tokens**

code.description: A unique readable code for the role

name.description: The role name as it's presented in the UI. By default, it will be assigned from the original permission, but can be overriden for a specific business

description.description: The role description as itâ€™s presented in the UD. By default, will be assigned from the original permission, but can be overriden for a specific business

items.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the Permission

delete.description:
Delete a specific BusinessRole  based on itâ€™s unique identifier (UID)

Available for **Business Tokens**

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Max: 100

post.description:

Available for **Business Tokens**

Available for **Business Tokens**
